title: Modern Combat 3 [PlayBook]
description:
When war hits home, abandon all fear.
** This game requires 1.37 GB of free storage space.
** Added the permission to see account information. We use this permission to set push notifications, allowing us to inform you of important news about the game. Your gmail account is checked locally only and is NOT sent to any server. We are working on doing the same without the need for this permission.
